mapper.select: select distinct(to_char(schedule_time_date_time,'YYYY-MM-DD')) sdate from schedule_time where schedule_no=#{scheduleNo} order by sdate
select * from schedule_time st left outer join hall using(hall_no) where st.schedule_no=#{scheduleNo} and to_char(st.schedule_time_date_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{scheduleTimeDate}
